function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid outbreak of COVID-19","Impact":"Forced shutdown of non-essential services, disruptions in supply chain, job losses, restrictions on trade","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, international cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing and tracing technologies, remote work technologies","People":"Billions of people, industrial workers, international traders","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, international organizations"},{"Description":"Stringent lockdown measures in automotive industry","Impact":"Disruptions in production, decline in automobile usage, decreased sales","Mitigation":"Implement safety protocols, support essential service transportation, promote remote work","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technologies, remote work technologies, vehicle sanitation technologies","People":"Automotive workers, essential service providers, transportation workers","Owner":"Automotive industry, governments, transportation authorities"}]}
